reviewText:
This gives you a step by step guide to setting up a waterfall.. we created an $8000 fall that gets comments from EVERY SINGLE PERSON that looks at it !! it was all due to this VHS...

The people who gave it low scores are probably professional installers that don't need the complete guide and step by step !!
Not very helpful.  There are so many other sources of information that is more helpful.  Call Savio and ask for a free copy of their instructional DVD, much more information.
You will get more complete and useful information on the internet than on this video.  Pretty much a waste of time and money...which could be spent on several good books.
The aquascape installation instructions for a pondless waterfall are probably a better guide.
